blog.name: atimefordirewolves
blog.title: "Have a biscuit, Potter"
blog.description: Sarah, 23, UK, Hufflepuff // I love Arya, Gendry, Theon, Dany, and Ginny Weasley with my whole moronic heart // #atimefordirewolves

title: Warrior girl =/= Not wanting love
body:
With the new trailer dropping, and promptly half of us going mad over our ships and their potential, I’m seeing a recurring trend when it comes to Arya and Brienne which has happened every season and can we just end this trend ASAP please. The trend being the idea that a tough warrior girl being in love will somehow reduce them as a warrior; that because they are a warrior, they don’t want love and affection.

Brienne’s wariness around men is not due to being uninterested in love or affection. It’s due to the fact she has previously been humiliated by men; men who view her size, stature, and interest in fighting as a complete joke, men who have only sought her out to humiliate her. She has not been alone for so long because she doesn’t want love. She has been alone for so long because she has never found anyone who doesn’t mock or shame her, who accepts her as both a warrior and a woman. Until Jaime Lannister came along.

Arya, meanwhile, has admittedly been shown as the tough cookie warrior girl for multiple seasons now - but that doesn’t mean she has shown zero interest in love or family. Love and family is what has always driven Arya; her list has been a crutch due to the absence of it (and it is why she turned tail as soon as she realised Jon was alive - because Jon and her love for him is far far more important than a list). Arya has also shown explicit interest in Gendry in Season 2 and 3, checking him out whilst he was making swords, breaking down in tears when she realised he was leaving her.

Both women are tough. Both women are strong. Both women are warriors.

But both women also have love interests who are tough. Their love interests are strong. Their love interests are absolutely warriors. And their love interests bring out the best in them; but ultimately, and most importantly, Jaime and Gendry are who Arya and Brienne want. They are people they have both fought and lied to protect, men who have brought out another side to them, men who would (and have, and do) jump into hell itself to protect them.

Being warriors doesn’t mean they don’t have those desires. They are perfectly capable of those desires, and they have those desires. Just because Brienne is a fighter, it does not mean she doesn’t love Jaime. Just because Arya is a fighter, it does not mean she doesn’t love Gendry. 

It is more than possible to want love and be a warrior. Brienne and Arya both do these things. Please can we stop with this trope of saying being in love will take away from who they are as warriors. Because the two are completely unrelated.

tags: l i s t e n
arya mask slipping like WHAT the FRICK does that mean. sansa thinking WHAT the FRICK does that mean in an entirely different way
jon who was taking the moment to take in his family and then realizing that he could finally for sure put a face to his mother
any implications fly over his head. theres a slight awkwardness but introductions continue and continue and things move on
over the coming days dany enjoys watching arya train. jon is just happy that she seems to like his family (his favourite sister).
sansa watches dany watching arya. shes suspicious because this woman has charmed jon and now she's got arya in her sight (jon confessed)
and arya the fool is falling for it like she was the one who loved songs and stories all along
(she always did) sansa realizes. just different songs and different stories. stories of dragons and warrier princesses & targaryens
protective!sansa who's determined not to loose her little sister again. oblivious!jon who has other things LIKE A WAR to worry about
confused&smitten!arya who is learning how to feel again and boy oh boy is it a kick. and daenerys who is just like oh hello i want this one
title: listen
body:
Dany and co at Winterfell, meeting the Starks
Someone, I know barristan is dead in show but hush, maybe: *staring at arya*
daenerys: *coughs* ser?
them: my apologies your grace, my lady, I just… you are the very picture of your aunt, my lady, I apologise for staring, if I did not know better…
daenerys: so this is the face my brother started a war, and died, for?
everyone: *silence* arya is struggling not to make a face
daenerys, with a slight smile: i suppose i understand now

summary: Am I the only one who thinks maybe Arya lost an eye? In the new Game of Thrones trailer, there’s a big red mark on her head...
body: Am I the only one who thinks maybe Arya lost an eye? In the new Game of Thrones trailer, there’s a big red mark on her head around the eye area *thinks* her right eye and it looks like it’s running blood. It may be that she got a wound on her head and the blood flowing/swelling has sealed her eye shut, but it looks like her right eye is at least closed. Idk everyone just seems focused on the fact she’s scared and running.

blog.name: maisiestyle
blog.title: Maisie Williams | Arya Stark | Styles & Musings

summary: Arya's weapons in S8 so far: her iconic sword Needle, a Dragonbone Valyrian dagger, a new Dragonglass staff/spear and dagger!!!...
caption:
Arya’s weapons in S8 so far: her iconic sword Needle, a Dragonbone Valyrian dagger, a new Dragonglass staff/spear and dagger!!! She is killing somethingthat bleeds in the last clip surroyndes by fire. Do wights bleed?

We see Jon running into the crypts, he looks angry and desperate…. escape route? The tunnels below are possibly the only way out of Winterfell.

We know in ep2, Jon will be in the crypts when the horn is blown that an attack on Winterfell is about happen.

Winterfell will be attacked by two forces: Cersei’s army the Golden Company which we see her meeting the leader Ser Harry Strickland and Euron. Then comes the Night King and his army of dead.

blog.title: Me and my thoughts
blog.description: Aurora . Star Wars, GoT, movies, music and actors. Totally shipping jedipilot, RebelCaptain, jonerys . Easily distracted by interesting stories and pop culture. I might post or reblog feminist topics. oh, and I'm a writer.

body:
My hope for GoT

I hope that Dany, Arya and Sansa will get along and be strong allies. Not silly fighting or bitching amongst them. Respect, friendship and strength. Anything else wouldn’t do thise great characters justice.

summary: I am not entirely sure if these two are walkers or not... I would kill to know what hurt and scared Arya that much. Please Arya...
body: I am not entirely sure if these two are walkers or not… I would kill to know what hurt and scared Arya that much. Please Arya stay safe, be careful and do NOT die!!!
